Content_wSideColumn.Name: Rule 1: Players
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Rule 1: Players

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
·         There are allowed six (6) players on the court and shall have a minimum of four (4) to start the match.

·         If only four (4) players are available, the person in the serving position is considered the only person upon which back row restrictions apply.

·         A team's roster can include up to 10 players.

 

Substitutions:

·         Substitution of players may be made when the ball is dead, upon making the request to either referee.

·         A team is allowed an unlimited number of substitutions. On a player-for-player basis, a player starting a game may be replaced by a substitute and may re-enter the game, but in the original position in the serving order in relation to other teammates. The starter and the substitute may replace each other an unlimited number of times throughout the game.

·         A team may also choose to substitute by rotation. Players enter the game from the center back position and exit following their service.

·         Choice of procedure must be declared prior to the start of each game. Choice of substitution method may change from game to game.
